block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$495,000 630 First Avenue (36th Street) (Manhattan Place) 1-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors; common charges $539; taxes $6,468; listed at $499,900, 1 week on market (Brokers: Sumitomo; Corcoran Group)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$495,000 630 First Avenue (36th Street) (Manhattan Place) 1-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors; common charges $539; taxes $6,468; listed at $499,900, 1 week on market (Brokers: Sumitomo; Corcoran Group)

$3.495 million 190 Riverside Drive (91st Street) 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 3,563-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, library, windowed eat-in kitchen, 2 decorative fireplaces, Hudson River view; common charges $2,169; taxes $14,184; listed at $3.495 million, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$430,000 146 West 57th Street (Metropolitan Tower) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 788-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, renovated kitchen, large living room, Hudson River view; common charges $713; taxes $5,328; listed at $430,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Feathered Nest)

$390,000 165 West 66th Street (Lincoln Terrace) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, entry hall, dining area, renovated kitchen, parquet floors; maintenance $898, 52% tax-deductible; listed at $389,000 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$120,000 2767 Decatur Avenue 4-bedroom, 1-bath, 70-year-old house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, full basement, needs renovation, 27-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $900; listed at $145,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Heritage First Realty/Better Homes and Gardens)

$230,000 3440 Giles Place 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 60-year-old attached brick town house; dining room, rear porch, full basement, 1-car garage, 20-by-86-ft. lot; taxes $1,192; listed at $249,000, 11 weeks on market (Broker: Trebach)

$325,000 1 Tiffany Place 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar former factory building; part-time doormen, dining area, h/w floors, fireplace, washer/dryer, harbor view, assigned parking; common charges $569, 100% tax exemption; listed at $325,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Brooklyn Bridge)

$340,000 819 Beverly Road 4-bedroom, 1-bath prewar wood-frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, tin ceilings, parquet floors, enclosed front porch, 20-by-110-ft. lot; taxes $1,500; listed at $350,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$375,000 60 Plaza Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; entry foyer, eat-in kitchen; maintenance $875, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $375,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Marilyn A. Donahue)

$240,000 45-22 215th Place 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 69-year-old Tudor; dining room, h/w floors, semifinished basement, 1-car garage, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,620; listed at $249,000, 6 weeks on market (Brokers: ReMax/Universal; West)

$320,000 92-23 71st Avenue 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 60-year-old detached house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 1-car garage, 26-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,509; listed at $350,000, 1 week on market (Broker: ReMax/F.H. Realty)

$315,000 17 Isabella Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 88-year-old colonial; dining room, renovated kitchen, fireplace, full basement, 2-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,897; listed at $335,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)

$559,000 5 Gramatan Court 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 20-year-old town-house condo; sunken living room, dining room, eat-in kitchen, patio, fireplace, powder room; taxes $11,287, common charges $421; listed at $559,000; 20 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; Sumitomo)

$431,000 26 Amherst Drive 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 43-year-old contemporary; deck, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, detached 1-car garage; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $10,000; listed at $425,000 (multiple bids); 8 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)

$300,000 77 Beverly Road 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 47-year-old ranch; entry hall, dining room, terrace, eat-in kitchen, attached 1-car garage; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $8,679; listed at $315,000; 12 weeks on market (Brokers: Weichert; Merritt)

$164,000 65 McKinley Avenue 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 69-year-old condo; sunken living room, French doors, terrace, dining room; taxes $3,184, common charges $342; listed at $169,000; 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Houlihan/ Lawrence)

$400,100 40 Harwich Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 35-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, h/w floors, family room with fireplace, c/a, deck, 2-car garage, 0.67-acre lot; taxes $5,318; listed at $390,000 (multiple bids), 2 days on market (Broker: Weichert)

$460,000 190 Montrose Avenue 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 45-year-old expanded ranch; patio, 2-car garage, family room, fireplace, 1-acre lot; taxes $13,472; listed at $488,876, 4 months on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

$825,000 327 East Saddle River Road 6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 28-year-old colonial; in-ground pool, 2 fireplaces, 3-car garage, c/a, deck, 1.63-acre lot; taxes $10,811; listed at $869,000, 4 months on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Joan Quigg)

$221,000 20 Kensington Court 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 12-year-old town-house condo; 1-car garage, c/a, fireplace, eat-in kitchen, common charges $207; taxes $4,511; listed at $224,900, 3 1/2 weeks on market (Broker: Weidel)

$658,000 6 Pintail Lane 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 34-year-old split-level renovated in 1998; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, c/a, fireplace, 1-car garage, 0.48-acre lot; taxes $5,092; listed at $658,000, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; Preferred Properties)

$1.2 million 22 Spectacle Lane 4-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 5-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, family room, rear deck, 3-car garage, 2.44-acre lot; taxes $12,141; listed at $1.3 million, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$710,000 81 Pipers Hill Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 25-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, 2 fireplaces, 2-car garage, 2-acre lot; taxes $6,987; listed at $725,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Realty Seven)

$245,000 21 Howard Court 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 50-year-old expanded ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den with fireplace, 77-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,700; listed at $259,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Atanas)

$945,000 51 Cedar Drive 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 71-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 4 fireplaces, basement, pool, 2-car garage, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $9,700; listed at $985,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Trylon)

$340,000 37 St. Paul's Place (Cathedral Gardens) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 56-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, basement, slate terrace, 2-car attached garage, 100-by-175-ft. lot; taxes $8,500; listed at $375,000, 14 weeks on market (Broker: Elaine Nolan)

$168,000 91 Cayuga Avenue 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 35-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 1-car attached garage, 1/4-acre lot; taxes $5,400; listed at $179,000, 1 day on market (Broker: Daniel Gale)
